channel.title: volunteering on Joe Bramall
channel.description: Recent content in volunteering on Joe Bramall

item.title: Design Manchester, Service Design Jam Days
item.description: I’m a big fan of Kathryn Grace website. She’s a champion of service design, helping to establish the North as a breeding ground for the discipline. Obviously I jumped at the opportunity to take part in a jam as part of Design Manchester. So what is service design anyway? Think of service design as user experience for life. It’s a way of looking at every interaction, touchpoint and challenge a person might encounter using our services.

item.title: Service design sprint with Imperial College Healthcare
item.description: The Challenge Reduce the amount of time a patient spends in hospital during the discharge process and minimise the risks involved for patients beginning Warfarin treatment. The Team A 6 strong team of doctors, consultants, patients and designers. Key to our early success was the inclusion of a junior doctor whose intimate knowledge of Warfarin treatment immediately earned her Project Champion status. The doctors on our team described a complex discharge process reliant on detailed dosages, continual monitoring and multiple stakeholders.
